name: Kill Those Klowns!
description:
Oh No!! Those pesky clowns are at it again! You have to complete as many levels and kill as many clowns as you can to beat your high score!

After you go through the forest, city, and circus, you get to fight the Clownty Sheriff, the most evil clown in the world!

This game can be played over and over again as you try to beat it with a higher score!

ALL SOUND EFFECTS IN THIS GAME ARE RIPPED FROM THIS VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z8pqREMESIk

-4 different game modes -6 very hard levels -1 giant boss
